docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v1 is currently the default API version. Users are recommended to use API v2 as future versions of Foreman will change the default to v2 and then deprecate and/or remove v1. You may explicitly use v1 by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: create

params.name: ip
params.description: not required if using a subnet with dhcp proxy

params.name: mac
params.description: not required if its a virtual machine

params.name: puppet_class_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: host_parameters_attributes
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: progress_report_id
params.description: UUID to track orchestration tasks status, GET /api/orchestration/:UUID/tasks

examples:
POST /api/hosts
{
  "host": {
    "name": "testhost11",
